app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online. Figure S1: The aroma profile chromatograms of the studied sage. A: Flowers S. dentata, b: Leaves S. dentata, c: Flowers S. scabra, d: Leaves S. scabra, Figure S2: The essential oil chromatograms of the studied sage species. S1 S. aurea, S2: S. dentata, S3: S. scabra, Table S1: Monographs of the studied Salvia species. References [ 66, 67, 68, 69, 70, 71] are cited in Supplementary Material.
